summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4277 for the improvement of Myrtle Street, from East Marginal Way to a point 420 feet west of the west margin of 7th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50872, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
